      • validateEmail

        public boolean validateEmail(Properties props)
                      throws ValidationException
        Description copied from interface: IEmailValidator
        valiteEmail does the following 1. First groups all the mail messages from the INBOX where the criteria is matched. 2. Retrive the body content of each email 2. Then inspects the email body for the text data which is passed thru "mailLookupString" 3. If the text data is found on all the grouped mail from step 1 then retruns TRUE or FLASE.
        Specified by:
        validateEmail in interface IEmailValidator
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ValidationException

      • retriveEmailBodyContentFromMessages

        public List<String> retriveEmailBodyContentFromMessages(Properties props)
                                                 throws ValidationException
        Description copied from interface: IEmailValidator
        retriveEmailBodyContentFromMessages does the following 1. First groups all the mail messages from the INBOX where the criteria is matched. 2. Retrive the body content of each email 3. Return all the mail body content in List.
        Specified by:
